title: This Looks
subtle: Concept (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: In This Looks, readers follow a curious owl as it comes upon things that can be described in many different ways. A variety of environments provide students with rich descriptions. Predictable text combined with charming illustrations make this book a perfect fit for emerging readers. The text allows students to draw on their prior knowledge to make connections as well as identify cause-and-effect relationships.
reviewWords: dirty, funny, pretty, shiny, ugly, wild
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
awareness: Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word this
